long_description: pour visiter notre site, vous devez avoir lâge minimum légal requis pour consommer de lalcool dans votre pays de résidence. a ideal drinks, lda é uma sociedade comercial com sede na quinta do seminário, casais do campo, 3045-161 coimbra, matriculada na conservatória do registo comercial sob o número único de matrícula e pessoa colectiva 509584713. this site is created, owned and operated by idealdrinks – serviços e distribuição, lda., and its administration is the responsibility of gabinete de sistemas de informação da idealdrinks, which can be contacted through the following contacts: 239 983615 or at quinta do seminário, casais, 3045-161 coimbra. no information published on the website of idealdrinks is constituted as a proposal, offer or recommendation to buy or sell any products, make any transaction or take any legal act, regardless of their nature. l'utilisation des services du site pour des bouts illicites est expressément interdite, soient-ils de nature civil, criminelle ou d'autres.
